arts.ttl: Cheltenham Town v Grimsby Town RECAP: Robins held by Mariners after Ethan Williams opener
arts.sum: But Harvey Rodgers levelled for Grimsby early in the second half after good play from Jason Daði Svanþórsson. Ethan Williams' second goal for the club put Michael Flynn's side ahead in the first half, two minutes after George Miller saw a penalty saved by Jordan Wright.

arts.ttl: Harvey Rodgers earns play-off hopefuls Grimsby a point at Cheltenham
Cheltenham Town's accounts highlight the need for new investment, admits financial director Clive Gowing
arts.sum: But Gowing admits Cheltenham remain under pressure to sell at least one player per year to continue to help balance the books until new investment is secured. Financial director Clive Gowing believes the club are in a more stable position off the pitch this year, with an FA Cup first round win and progress to the quarter-finals of the EFL Trophy netting £135,000 in bonus revenue.

arts.ttl: Praise for fans, feeling like a win after late fightback but injury setbacks - Cheltenham Town boss Michael Flynn after Walsall draw
arts.sum: The Fleetwood and Wimbledon and Fleetwood games I can understand them losing a little bit of faith, all three of them being early on and they are thinking 'oh no, what's going to go on' but we needed time to gel and build. But they are such a good, strong team, well-drilled and you can see why they are top of the league.
